title: (x) Kruder Dorfmeister K&D Sessions - Venus {Dav}

comments.content:
‘ [Venus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001214/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=LI00056301P1)’ _( Mager )_..

_( [As previously requested by you, Ole, and identified by Yves, 2 months ago](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001214/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/67777.html).. )_
thanks for the help again. I lost the external 160g drive I had documented this on last time I asked, a couple of months back. Don’t forget to back up….
